alert.note: Alert for Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 3:32PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MEDINA AND NORTHERN SUMMIT COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM EST... At 332 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Chippewa Lake to near Lodi. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Akron, Medina, Cuyahoga Falls, Barberton, Hudson, Wadsworth, Twinsburg, Macedonia, Chippewa Lake, Stow, Brecksville, Norton, Fairlawn, Munroe Falls, Richfield, Reminderville, Silver Lake, Seville, Boston Heights, and Westfield Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
